I'm **Solomon**, an aspiring **Audit & Assurance professional** and **Software Engineer** with a strong foundation in **Accounting, Financial Technology, and Backend Engineering**.  

I am passionate about bridging the gap between **finance and technology**: building tools that improve reporting accuracy, automating workflows, and documenting processes so others can learn and build faster. Alongside my technical journey, I also enjoy **technical writing**, turning complex ideas into clear, actionable knowledge.  

I create and contribute to:
- üßæ **Audit & FinTech projects** (automation, compliance, reporting)  
- üíª **Backend engineering** (Python, Django, Flask, Git workflows, repo hygiene)  
- üìö **Technical content** (documentation, tutorials, and guides)  
- üåç **Community learning** (mentorship, knowledge sharing, and collaboration)
